details.name: Arsalan Saad
details.about: Hello, I am a (psuedo) engineer turned (psuedo) product manager thats tinkering with LLMs (who isn't) and trying to build cool (hopefully) products with them.

experiences.name: XaaS (IDP Platform)
experiences.title: Product Manager
experiences.description: Designed Explore, a Generative AI tool to enhance engagement for 100+ clients. Developed a dashboard for 15+ ML model metrics and created PRDs to ensure progress tracking. Devised pricing strategies and marketing tracks for the platform launch.

experiences.name: Bank Statements Extraction
experiences.title: Product Manager
experiences.description: Led the development of a bank statement extraction engine with 95% accuracy and 70% FTE cost reduction. Defined workflows, managed 50+ Jira stories, and improved stakeholder communication through user and product strategy documents.

experiences.name: Gen AI Evaluation
experiences.title: Product Manager
experiences.description: Conducted a comparative study of 20+ Generative AI platforms. Developed a ranking algorithm and prototyped an MVP for evaluation using Figma, incorporating stakeholder feedback.

experiences.name: AI Camera
experiences.title: Product Manager
experiences.description: Benchmarked 25+ camera features across 15+ apps and proposed 9+ AI-powered features for HDR, low-light imaging, and editing. Designed a PRD with 10+ features and a 2-year roadmap for the S23 camera.

experiences.name: Asset Failure Modelling
experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Developed an ML model for anomaly detection, reducing asset costs by 18%. Automated customer onboarding to increase registrations by 35% and enhanced operational workflows with cross-functional collaboration.

experiences.name: Automated Site Creation
experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Designed a simulator for IoT data nodes, eliminating 93% of supervised workflows. Implemented automated testing to reduce supervision time by 85% and improve system reliability.
